metadata.title: CVE-2018-6147 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Lack of secure text entry mode in Browser UI in Google Chrome on Mac priorto 67.0.3396.62 allowed a local attacker to obtain potentially sensitiveinformation from process memory via a local process.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
oxide-qt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
